isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - INTRODUCTION - Engine Identification - Emission Label

svcproc.title: Emission Label

figure.caption: Location of Emission Label, 1994-1996 Model Years (Right Side of Engine)
Location of Emission Label, 1997 and Up Model Years (Left Side of Engine)

svcproc.para: On 1994-1996 model year engines, the emission label is located on the right valve cover. On 1997 model year engines, the emission label is located on the left valve cover.

The emission label identifies an engine's model code, the year it was manufactured, the year the engine was certified to meet government emission standards, and other relevant information. This label exists in multiple languages.
